Text: Orders squadron to engage the enemy. Can only be executed while on a command mission.
Orders squadron to disengage the enemy and fall back. Can only be executed while on a command mission.
Orders squadron to re-engage the enemy. Can only be executed while on a command mission.

Orders squadron to execute a limit break on a single target. Also increases damage dealt by party members within a 20-yalm range. Can only be executed while on a command mission, limit gauge is at level 1, and all three squadron members are conscious.
Displays Order Hotbar. Can only be executed while on a command mission.
